name: MojUredFiscalization
author: Lumen Spei

sections.description:
MojUredFiscalization is a custom made WooCommerce plugin that serves as a solution for connecting e-Ured of the Croatian Chamber of Economy with WooCommerce. Its main feature is syncing e-Ured’s products with a WooCommerce store of the same user; hence being able to create fiscalized invoices on e-Ured in accordance to sold product over at WooCommerce.

FEATURES:

Creating invoices in e-Ured for Orders sold in WooCommerce
Creating fiscalized invoices in e-Ured for Orders sold in WooCommerce

REQUIREMENTS:

e-Ured account at the Croatian Chamber of Economy (https://digitalnakomora.hr/politika-privatnosti)
FINA’s certificate for fiscalization

CONTACT

We greatly appreciate you testing out this plugin and would be more than happy to offer assistance.
Please direct your questions and feedback to info@lumenspei.com.
